HotelElement.Name: Hampton by Hilton St. Petersburg ExpoForum

Description.Text: Hampton by Hilton St. Petersburg ExpoForum is a modern 3-star property offering convenient accommodation close to Pulkovo Airport. Highlights include a gym, free Wi-Fi and a good location near Pulkovo Observatory. The hotel is situated approximately 6km from the airport terminals in the south of the city. Regional places of interest include Victory Square, Chesme Church and the House of Soviets, a Stalinist office complex. Airport bus services provide fast and easy access to central St. Petersburg. The hotel is housed in a 21st-century mid-rise building with a state-of-the-art design. Facilities include a gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style. Amenities include tea and coffee equipment, a 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV, work desk and mp3 dock. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
